attributes.action: Make all MPs REPAY their EXPENSES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs have exploited the expenses system and greedily taken money from the tax payer.

I understand that MPs have an important role and therefore should have privileges. However there is a point where thier expenditure of the tax payers money reaches and MPs have surpassed this. 

They have exploited the system and have the responsibility of repaying the money.

Fraud is illegal in this country so why should it be legal for them.

Please sign this petition and send a clear message to the Prime Minister and his fellow MPs

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
